title: $1000 to spend, bring what you have PLEASE!
author: SethY

posts.post_title: $1000 to spend, bring what you have PLEASE!
posts.post_content:
I am looking to buy something nice :)

I collect mainly White Sox and Brooklyn.

Anything Ed Walsh, Dahlen, Shoeless Joe, Gandil, Weaver, Comiskey, Anson, Wagner, etc. could entice me!

Basically I am looking for something great to add to my collection! 

If you are looking to sell feel free to PM me, post here, or email me at [url]seth.yarkony@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks guys!

posts.post_title: Re: $1000 to spend, bring what you have PLEASE!
